title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Consumption per resident in gallons, with a total of 14 data points.
Overall Consumption per resident in gallons has increased over the Year
Consumption per resident in gallons is slightly constant from 2005 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Max Consumption per resident in gallons about 2.95 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Consumption per resident in gallons about 2.32 was recorded at Year 2005
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Consumption per resident in gallons, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2008 to 2014.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2014 to 2018.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2005 to 2008.
